page.title: 19PURITON WOMEN'S INSTITUTE
page.content: In this year of 1985 one of the most prominent women's organisations in the country is the{National Federation of {Women's Institutes.}In Puriton we have had a Womens Institute for the past{30 {years. Meetings are held on the first Tuesday of every month in the village Hall.At the meetings guest speakers are invited to talk on a variety of subjects,for example natural history arts and crafts,cookery, local and national organisations and charities. Members also join in local clubs and activities such as skittles,craft classes and competition. Generally,the aim of our W.I. is{to {unite women of similar interests and {to promote a feeling of responsibility {to the community,not only within the {village but also throughout the {country.
